response.overview: Since 2012, Marcus Tartt has transformed lives and communities through entrepreneurship as the Director of Renaissance Entrepreneurship Center. The Center has helped thousands of small businesses launch and grow throughout the Bay Area. Marcus was born and raised in the Bayview and draws on his deep roots in the community to provide invaluable local guidance and drive the Centerâ€™s success. By helping entrepreneurs reach new levels of success and self-sufficiency through his entrepreneurship initiatives, Tartt strengthens the community as a whole.
response.title: Black Renaissance - Marcus Tartt
